code: export var generateBase64FromImage=function generateBase64FromImage(imageFile){var reader=new FileReader();var promise=new Promise(function(resolve,reject){reader.onload=function(e){return resolve(e.target.result);};reader.onerror=function(err){return reject(err);};});reader.readAsDataURL(imageFile);return promise;};
